name: Darby's Circus
description:
This game is a story game designed and developed by a three-person team. In the game, Houdini Darby, a circus boy, is forced by the head of the circus to use harsh methods to train Maya, a tiger who grew up with him. The boy Darby didn't want to do this, and the tiger Maya tried to escape from the circus several times, but both of their actions were stopped by the head of the circus. In a grand show, the boy Houdini and the tiger Maya found a chance and escaped from the circus together. Players will play the boy Houdini and the tiger Maya at the same time in the game, complete the whole story from different perspectives, and discover the secrets of the boy and the tiger.

In this game development, I am responsible for all the art design, part of the plot design, and level design.
